app.name: Moesif
app.short_description: Resolve customer issues faster with Moesif API Analytics
app.long_description: With the Moesif Zendesk plugin, get context on the user and their API activity right in Zendesk tickets
app.installation_instructions:
- Login to Moesif.com
 - Go to Settings -> Extensions Setup and copy your partner integration token
 - Paste integration token into Zendesk plugin field
 - Click Install

loading: Welcome to the Moesif Zendesk Plugin

fetch.fail: Failed to fetch information from the server

name: Name

token.label: Plugin Token
token.helpText: Please obtain your Zendesk token from your Moesif Account: Settings -> Extensions -> Zendesk.
